title: Font ID Help
content:
I'm looking to ID these 2 fonts in this logo. I'm trying to recreate it so that I can finish a brochure I'm working on.  
Any help with this is greatly appreciated!

| --- | --- |
| [2402-PVH-Final-Logo\_4c.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818002023/http:/typophile.com/files/2402-PVH-Final-Logo_4c.png) | 22.26 KB |
author: Cammymachu
